Find Services, Information, Locations and More

County SERVICES

Whether you are looking to licence a business, lookup tax information, or find the best way to spend your next night on the town. The below sections will provide you all the information you need.

Davis County
Business Services

Business

Business licensing, food handlers permit, tax information lookup, property search, restaurant inspections, and more...

View Services

Davis County
Residential Services

Residential

Inmate bookings, jobs, kennel roster, marriage licenses, passports, property taxes, pet licenses, and more...

View Services

Davis County
Antelope Island

Recreation & Entertainment

Davis County is home to some of Utah’s most magnificent geologic scenery; Antelope Island, and the Great Salt Lake. Explore now...

View Services

Davis County Careers.

It is our mission in the Davis County Human Resources Office to promote, through dedicated customer service, the recruitment, selection and retention of highly qualified employees who will effectively serve the citizens of Davis County; to promote a safe work environment for all County employees; and to provide employee benefits and services with courtesy and efficiency.

Join the Davis County Team!


View Careers

Featured NEWS

Keep up to date with current Davis County centered News stories, programs, taxes, emergencies, and much more.



Notice of Tax Sale Properties

4/16/2019 2:52:35 PM by

On the 15th day of May, 2019 at 10:00 a.m. in the Davis County Administration Building at 61 South Main Street, Farmington, Utah 84025, Room 131, the Davis County Clerk/Auditor, Curtis Koch, will offer for sale at public auction and sell to the highest bidder pursuant to the provisions of Section 59-2-1351.1 Utah Code, the following described real property located in Davis County and now delinquent and subject to tax sale. No bid less than the total amount of taxes, penalties, interest and costs which are a charge on the real estate will be accepted.  

Tax Sale List

Public Notice

4/2/2019 1:54:37 PM by WebMaster

Summary of an ordinance of Davis County establishing temporary land use regulations pertaining to all subdivisions in unincorporated Davis County. 

View Summary

Senior Services Survey

2/13/2019 6:45:32 PM by Take Survey

Please take this survey for caregivers and adults ages 55 and older. This survey will help us better understand the needs of caregivers of all ages and adults ages 55 + and improve the services already available. Thank you for taking the time to provide this valuable information.

Take Survey

South Davis Rec Center Survey

2/4/2019 8:38:34 PM by Take Survey

Please help us determine the best plan of action for the South Davis Recreational Center, your input will be essential to providing the best facility for years to come. 

Take Survey

2018 Delinquent Property Taxes

12/27/2018 5:00:29 PM by DC Webmaster

The Davis County Treasurer has made public the notice of delinquent property taxes for 2018. To view this list please click below. 

View Now

2019 Budget

12/6/2018 4:47:16 PM by Web Master

The 2019 budget is now available for the public to view online. Please click the link below to view the PDF document. 

View 2019 Budget

Public Hearing Notice

12/3/2018 5:40:24 PM by Web Master

Tentative budget is available for public inspection at the Clerk/Auditor’s office in room 102 of the Davis County Administration Building in Farmington, Utah. 

More Information

Proposed Tax Increase within Davis County

7/17/2018 8:31:20 PM by DC Webmaster

Several taxing entities are proposing to increase property tax revenue within Davis County: Bountiful City, Kaysville City, Syracuse City, West Point City, and North Davis Fire District.

Proposed Tax Increase

Community Videos

We are teaming up with CGI to showcase Davis County in the best way possible. We would like to showcase specific strengths of Davis County like; tourism, quality of life, economic development, and a whole lot more.
Click on the thumbnail to learn more!

County Employees

County Departments

Upcoming EVENTS

Keep busy with Davis County's upcoming events.



Cross E Ranch - Baby Animal Festival

Apr 05, 2019 - May 04, 2019
3500 N. 2200 W
Salt Lake City, UT
(801) 203-0148

Come enjoy a family fun day at our beautiful working ranch. General admission tickets include: The opportunity to love on all our baby animals including: chicks, bunnies, goats, piglets, calves, and more! Hay Ride to see our mama cows and their calves and to learn about how a farm & cattle ranch operates!

More Information

Baby Animal Days

May 10, 2019 - May 11, 2019
875 South 50 West
Kaysville, UT
801-298-1302

In addition to all our baby animals, we also have reptiles, sheep shearing demos, earth wing shows, goat milking, horse rides, train rides, and food vendors. This year we have a new layout to better serve our visitors with lots of baby animals and petting locations.

More Information

Public Star Party on Antelope Island State Park

Apr 21, 2019 - Apr 21, 2019
White Rock Bay
Antelope Island, UT
801-451-3279

In celebration of International Dark Sky Week, April 15-21, 2018, Ogden Astronomical Society will be holding a public star party beginning at 6:00 pm in White Rock Bay. Solar viewing will take place from 6:00 pm to sunset, followed by a short presentation about light pollution.

More Information

Great Salt Lake Bird Festival 2019

May 15, 2019 - May 19, 2019
Various locations
Antelope Island State Park,
801-451-3286

The Great Salt Lake Bird Festival is one of the most unique bird festivals in the U.S. The field trips are held at some of the most amazing wildlife areas in the world and are abundant with bird life!

More Information

Antelope By Moonlight 2019 - One Wicked Ride

Jul 12, 2019 - Jul 12, 2019
White Rocks Campground Rd
Syracuse, UT
8014513279

The ride starts July 12, 2019 at 10pm (check-in starts at 7:30pm) at White Rock Bay and is lit by the full moon. The 24 mile route goes from White Rock Bay to the historic Fielding Garr Ranch and back. The road is asphalt- road or mountain bikes are great.

More Information

How can we improve?

We are working hard to provide the residents of Davis County everything they need from this website. Let us know how we can improve your experience!

Leave Feedback


Davis County is Utah's smallest county in land area. It is a narrow strip of land only 223 square miles but is the third largest county in population. An estimated 342,281 residents live in the County's fifteen communities. Learn More

Google Translate Disclaimer
The Davis County Government website is provided in English. However, the Google™ Translate option may assist visitors in reading it in other languages. Google™ Translate cannot translate all types of documents, and it may not give you an exact translation all the time. Anyone relying on information obtained from Google™ Translate does so at his or her own risk. Davis County does not make any promises, assurances, or guarantees as to the accuracy of the translations provided. Davis County, its legislatures, employees, officers, and/or agents shall not be liable for damages or losses of any kind resulting from, or in connection with, the use or performance of Google™ Translate, including but not limited to, damages or losses caused by reliance upon the accuracy of any such information, or damages incurred from the viewing, distributing, or copying of such materials.

It is our mission in the Davis County Human Resources Office to promote, through dedicated customer service, the recruitment, selection and retention of highly qualified employees who will effectively serve the citizens of Davis County; to promote a safe work environment for all County employees; and to provide employee benefits and services with courtesy and efficiency.

Upcoming EVENTS

Keep busy with Davis County's upcoming events.



Baby Animal Days

May 10, 2019 - May 11, 2019
875 South 50 West
Kaysville, UT
801-298-1302

In addition to all our baby animals, we also have reptiles, sheep shearing demos, earth wing shows, goat milking, horse rides, train rides, and food vendors. This year we have a new layout to better serve our visitors with lots of baby animals and petting locations.

More Information

Public Star Party on Antelope Island State Park

Apr 21, 2019 - Apr 21, 2019
White Rock Bay
Antelope Island, UT
801-451-3279

In celebration of International Dark Sky Week, April 15-21, 2018, Ogden Astronomical Society will be holding a public star party beginning at 6:00 pm in White Rock Bay. Solar viewing will take place from 6:00 pm to sunset, followed by a short presentation about light pollution.

More Information

Great Salt Lake Bird Festival 2019

May 15, 2019 - May 19, 2019
Various locations
Antelope Island State Park,
801-451-3286

The Great Salt Lake Bird Festival is one of the most unique bird festivals in the U.S. The field trips are held at some of the most amazing wildlife areas in the world and are abundant with bird life!

More Information

Antelope By Moonlight 2019 - One Wicked Ride

Jul 12, 2019 - Jul 12, 2019
White Rocks Campground Rd
Syracuse, UT
8014513279

The ride starts July 12, 2019 at 10pm (check-in starts at 7:30pm) at White Rock Bay and is lit by the full moon. The 24 mile route goes from White Rock Bay to the historic Fielding Garr Ranch and back. The road is asphalt- road or mountain bikes are great.

More Information

How can we improve?

We are working hard to provide the residents of Davis County everything they need from this website. Let us know how we can improve your experience!

Leave Feedback


Davis County is Utah's smallest county in land area. It is a narrow strip of land only 223 square miles but is the third largest county in population. An estimated 342,281 residents live in the County's fifteen communities. Learn More
